ygData.subject: Re: mistake
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I ve had a problem, as I get higher level, with this not always working.  I ve gotten to the point where I ll jump, crouch and run around, it seems to
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I've had a problem, as I get higher level, with this not always
working. I've gotten to the point where I'll jump, crouch and run around,
it seems to stop me MOST of the time. LOL

On the up side, I've been rather shocked at how things DON'T interrupt me as
much. At level 30, multiple things can be pounding on me,and I still can
sometimes gate a gate, DD, or root off. Cool!

-Vor
30th Level Wizard, Karana

----- Original Message -----
From: Dominic Franchetti <DFranchetti@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 1:20 PM
Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] mistake


> From: Dominic Franchetti <DFranchetti@...>
>
> Yeah, moving around usually works. Although, I have had my gate go off
> even after I started moving but only once.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ideoit [mailto:ideoit@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 7:50 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] mistake
>
>
> From: Ideoit <ideoit@...>
>
> say I ran into a problem last night that is a bit embarrasing. I was
> ...actually i dont know where i was :P I druid teleported me somewhere i
> just followed for the hell of it. anyway i was fighting some lowly skel
> that decided to pester us on r way to i think mino caves? anyway i went
> to cast fire bolt on it and i acidently hit my gate spell AAK!! I
> tried hittimg esc but it didnt work. Do ANY of u know how to stop a
> spell from being cast if u want to.
> -id
>
